YeboJek History

See how Yebojek changed over time.

Version 0.20

  • Added Twitter Bootstrap
  • Simplified _includes
  • Responsive nav with dropdown

Version 0.13

  • Removed cat-tag
  • implemented standard pagination in /posts/index.html
  • Added a category archive plugin /category

Version 0.12

Added divs and css blanks for

  • Page Titles
  • Sidebar Titles

Styled the following

  • Blockquotes
  • Links in general
  • paragraphs in general
  • Headings in general
